explains: vt. 逃离（flee 的 ing 形式）
vi. 突然消失（flee 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: flee from vt. 从……逃出来

sentences.en: The firing continued even while the protestors were fleeing.
sentences.cn: 即使在抗议者逃离时，枪击仍在继续。

sentences.en: Police chased the fleeing terrorists and later made two arrests.
sentences.cn: 警方追赶逃窜的恐怖分子，后来逮捕了两个人。

sentences.en: He applied for asylum in 1987 after fleeing the police back home.
sentences.cn: 他于1987年逃脱本国的警察之后申请了避难许可。
